version_description: - Routine fixes and improvements

- Instagram Photos!
- Routine bug fixes

This is a big update. We hope you love these new features as much as we do:

- Sign up without Facebook
- Selfie verification
- Upload photos from Camera Roll, Facebook, Instagram
- And much more!
- Improved many bugs and crashes
- Brand new profiles with more detailed profile information

- Big Redesign!
- Brand new swipe experience
- Many more fixes and improvements
Fixed signup bugs.
Many new features and design updates
Fixed some bugs and crashes

- More features
- Routine bug fixes
- Routine fixes and improvements

- Better community features
- Hide online status
- Fixed crashes and bugs

- Badges!
- Fixed bugs and crashes

300,000 single Muslims can now enjoy...

This is a big update that includes a smoother experience of using Minder. Messaging now includes delivered and read reciepts. New badges are added including ID verification badge and responsive badge. You can now choose to hide your online status from others.

We are also actively policing the community to reject or ban people who are fake or spammy. Your reports are always helping!

And as always, many bug fixes including random crashes.

Happy Mindering!

This update includes some performance improvements and bug fixes.

We are currently averaging one marriage per day from the app. Thank you for the support and response!
This update includes many big improvements to our chat system. Brand new chat engine and UI, typing notifications and many more things.
This update includes many big improvements to our chat system. Brand new chat engine and UI, typing notifications and many more things.
Fixed some more bugs and issues with the new chat. It should be a much more smoother experience.
This update brings some minor enhancements and bug fixes with the new Chat.
This update includes a lot of bugs fixed and performance improvements.
Fixed crash on latest iOS.
This update includes performance improvements and bug fixes.
This update includes performance improvements and bug fixes.
This update includes performance improvements and bug fixes.
This update includes fixes for some bugs, crashes and performance improvements.

- Me is no longer the center of your Minder universe. If you want to view or edit me, check out your preferences tab.
- Bad boys, bad boys, whatcha gonna do when they come for you? Rack up too much bad feedback and our system will ban you.
- Check out our new flavors! Ahmadi, Ibadi, Bahai, and Bohra Muslims can now stick out of the crowd.
- Remove unnecessary FB permission
- Fixed bug where you could not chat with your matches when your profile is rejected

- Me is no longer the center of your Minder universe. If you want to view or edit me, check out your preferences tab.
- Bad boys, bad boys, whatcha gonna do when they come for you? Rack up too much bad feedback and our system will ban you.
- Check out our new flavors! Ahmadi, Ibadi, Bahai, and Bohra Muslims can now stick out of the crowd.
- Remove unnecessary FB permission
- Fixed bug where you could not chat with your matches when your profile is rejected
- Fix issue with push notifications from messages getting app stuck on preferences tab

- Check out the new community tab! We will be publishing interesting articles, success stories, and our podcast there to help you get the information you need to pick the right partner!
- Matches are what make us feel all fuzzy inside so we want to make sure everyone gets them. Now until you get your first match you get double swipes!
- Fixed an issue where telegram messages were not showing up as the first message in a chat
This update contains many bug fixes, better reporting system and new privacy features.

So you're a bad bug,
Make our users sad bug,
Opposite of rad bug,
Glitch like it's a fad bug.

We're those good devs,
Code just like we should devs,
Get under the hood devs,
Like we said we would devs,
And we fixed some, bugs.

- You can now send GIFs to express yourself
- Updated iPhone 11 & iPhone Pro support
- Added instructions for new users
Fix for crash while swiping

In 2015, we started Minder with the intention of helping Muslims all over the world get married. Since then, we’ve helped match tens of thousands of people with their spouses. We loved being Minder, but we needed a name that better reflects our mission and values. Today, we are happy to welcome you to Salams! Along with our name change, we’ve added a suite of new features like voice notes, Islamic priorities, and other enhanced profiles to further enrich the experience. We are excited to start this new journey with you. Salams!
